subject: query(urgent)
msgSnippet: hi i have a problem while running junit. it is running 2 times for every test  i-e if i have 2 test cases it is running for 4 times . how should i configure
messageBody:
hi
i have a problem while running junit. it is
running 2 times for every test i-e if i have 2 test cases it is running for 4 times . how should i configure junit to run only once.

regards
bhanu
